title: Ocmulgee National Monument: Schedule Of Events
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Schedule Of Events               Schedule Of Events           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 3 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Ocmulgee National Monument Children's Pottery      Time: 3:00 PM to 3:45 PM Location: Ocmulgee Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Children can learn how to make clay pots View Details      Ocmulgee National Monument Butterfly Bio Blitz      Time: 9:00 AM to 3:00 PM Location: Ocmulgee Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Help identify different species of butterfly in the park View Details      Ocmulgee National Monument Celebrating 100 years of the National Park Service through photography      Time: 5:00 PM to 7:00 PM Location: Visitor Center Fees: Free     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Submit your photos of the National Parks over the past 100 years.
